main event: Three revolving beacons were reported in the sky over North Carver, Massachusetts on May 6th.
interesting points: The objects were described as having three revolving beacons, one red, one green, and one blue.
There were three larger objects in a formation, with two smaller objects trailing behind.
The objects were estimated to be at an altitude of 5,000 to 6,000 feet and were observed for 20-30 minutes.
The witness was certain the objects were not any type of aircraft they had seen before.
Boston Search Control Tower and local police were contacted, but they were unable to identify the objects.
sighted object: three revolving beacons, with three larger objects and two smaller objects in a formation
